snippet: Organizers of the National Book Awards dinner have added show business elements as part of an attempt to increase the event’s appeal.
abstract: Organizers of the National Book Awards are trying to transform event's dowdy image into a glamorous one with change of venue, Oscar-style red carpet and celebrity guests.
lead_paragraph: Organizers of the National Book Awards dinner have added show business elements as part of an attempt to increase the event’s appeal.

headline.seo: National Book Awards Dinner Reinvents Itself
headline.main: Book Awards Seek a Bigger Splash, Red Carpet and All
headline.print_headline: Book Awards Seek a Bigger Splash, Red Carpet and All
